name: Dong Shao
content: 软件学院 邵栋 软件学院 电话： 邮箱：dongshao AT nju.edu.cn 地址： 办公地址： 邮编： 邵栋  Dong SHAO 现任南京大学软件学院副教授，软件学院副院长，智能软件与工程学院执行院长。主要从事软件工程教学研究工作，研究方向为敏捷软件开发、软件研发效能、软件过程、DevOps、大语言模型驱动软件工程（LLM4SE)等，在国际主流学术会议期刊发表数十篇学术论文。南京大学软件学院软件研发效能实验室研究团队、“南京大学-星环科技星云数据技术联合研究中心”，国家级教学团队“软件工程主干课程教学团队”成员。中国计算机学会软件工程专业委员会成员。一次获得中华人民共和国教育部颁发的“国家级教学成果一等奖（排名3）”，三次获得“国家级教学成果奖二等奖”，两次获得江苏省教学成果特等奖，两次获得 “南京大学我最喜爱的老师”称号。       Dong Shao is an Associate Professor at the Software Institute, Nanjing University, and also the Vice Dean of the Software Institute. He is also the Executive Dean of the School of Intelligent Software and Engineering, Nanjing University.       His main research work focuses on software engineering, with research interests in agile software development, software development efficiency, software processes, and DevOps. He has published dozens of academic papers in international  academic conferences and journals. He is a member of the Software Development Efficiency Laboratory at the Software Institute, Nanjing University, the "Nanjing University-Xinghuan Technology Xingyun Data Technology Joint Research Center," and the national-level teaching team "Software Engineering Core Course Teaching Team." He is also a member of the Software Engineering Professional Committee of the China Computer Society.       He has been awarded the "National Teaching Achievement First Prize (Rank 3)" by the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China once, and the "National Teaching Achievement Second Prize" three times. Selected Publications：•Guoping Rong, Hao Wang, Shenghui Gu, Yangchen Xu, Jialin Sun, Dong Shao, He Zhang.
